blocks.name: crngo
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all unital rings.
blocks.origin: const class crngo { RingOps }

blocks.content: Define the class of all unital rings. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-rngo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(crngo, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cablo), wf(cv(s1), cxp(crn(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))), crn(cv(s0)))), wa(wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s4, crn(cv(s0)), w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cv(s1), cv(s4)), co(cv(s2), cv(s1), co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s4)))), wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4))), co(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cv(s0), co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s4)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s1), cv(s4)), co(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s4)), cv(s0), co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s4)))))))), wrex(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cv(s3)), wceq(co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-rngo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ RingOps = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà AbelOp ‚àß(s1 :(ran(s0)√ó ran(s0))‚Üí ran(s0)))‚àß(‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(s0), ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà ran(s0), ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà ran(s0),(((s2[s1]s3)[s1]s4)=(s2[s1](s3[s1]s4))‚àß(s2[s1](s3[s0]s4))=((s2[s1]s3)[s0](s2[s1]s4))‚àß((s2[s0]s3)[s1]s4)=((s2[s1]s4)[s0](s3[s1]s4))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà ran(s0), ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà ran(s0),((s2[s1]s3)= s3 ‚àß(s3[s1]s2)= s3)))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: relrngo
blocks.content: The class of all unital rings is a relation. (Contributed by FL, 31-Aug-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm relrngo() {
  |- wrel(crngo)
} = {
  relopabi(hs0, hs1, crngo, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cablo), wf(cv(hs1), cxp(crn(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs0))), crn(cv(hs0)))), wa(wral(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs0)), w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)), co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), co(cv(hs3), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)))), wceq(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), co(cv(hs3), cv(hs0), cv(hs4))), co(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)), co(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs0), co(cv(hs3), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)))))))), wrex(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, crn(cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cv(hs3)), wceq(co(cv(hs3), cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cv(hs3))))))))
  df-rngo(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
}

thm relrngo() {
  ‚ä¢ Rel(RingOps)
} = {
  relopabi(hs0, hs1, crngo, ((hs0 ‚àà AbelOp ‚àß(hs1 :(ran(hs0)√ó ran(hs0))‚Üí ran(hs0)))‚àß(‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ran(hs0), ‚àÄ(hs3 ‚àà ran(hs0), ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà ran(hs0),(((hs2[hs1]hs3)[hs1]hs4)=(hs2[hs1](hs3[hs1]hs4))‚àß(hs2[hs1](hs3[hs0]hs4))=((hs2[hs1]hs3)[hs0](hs2[hs1]hs4))‚àß((hs2[hs0]hs3)[hs1]hs4)=((hs2[hs1]hs4)[hs0](hs3[hs1]hs4))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà ran(hs0), ‚àÄ(hs3 ‚àà ran(hs0),((hs2[hs1]hs3)= hs3 ‚àß(hs3[hs1]hs2)= hs3))))))
  df-rngo(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
}

blocks.name: isrngo

}

thm isrngod(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí < c0, c1 > ‚àà RingOps)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà AbelOp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 = ran(c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 :(c2 √ó c2)‚Üí c2))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((s0[c1]s1)[c1]s2)=(s0[c1](s1[c1]s2)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[c1](s1[c0]s2))=((s0[c1]s1)[c0](s0[c1]s2)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((s0[c0]s1)[c1]s2)=((s0[c1]s2)[c0](s1[c1]s2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3[c1]s1)= s1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(s1[c1]c3)= s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, < c0, c1 > ‚àà RingOps, ((c0 ‚àà AbelOp ‚àß(c1 :(ran(c0)√ó ran(c0))‚Üí ran(c0)))‚àß(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),(((s0[c1]s1)[c1]s2)=(s0[c1](s1[c1]s2))‚àß(s0[c1](s1[c0]s2))=((s0[c1]s1)[c0](s0[c1]s2))‚àß((s0[c0]s1)[c1]s2)=((s0[c1]s2)[c0](s1[c1]s2))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1))))))
  jca31(w0, c0 ‚àà AbelOp, (c1 :(ran(c0)√ó ran(c0))‚Üí ran(c0)), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),(((s0[c1]s1)[c1]s2)=(s0[c1](s1[c1]s2))‚àß(s0[c1](s1[c0]s2))=((s0[c1]s1)[c0](s0[c1]s2))‚àß((s0[c0]s1)[c1]s2)=((s0[c1]s2)[c0](s1[c1]s2))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1)))))

blocks.name: rngoi
blocks.content: The properties of a unital ring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 8-Sep-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm rngoi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cablo), wf(c2, cxp(c3, c3), c3)), wa(wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, c3, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), c1, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cablo), wf(c2, cxp(c3, c3), c3)), wa(wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, c3, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), c1, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  sylib(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cablo), wf(c2, cxp(c3, c3), c3)), wa(wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, c3, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), c1, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))), wcel(cop(c1, c2), crngo))
  eqeltrd(cop(c1, c2), crngo, c0, wcel(c0, crngo))
  syl6reqr(cop(c1, c2), c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wcel(c0, crngo))
  mpan(wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wrel(crngo))
  relrngo()
  1st2nd(crngo, c0)
  opeq12i(c1, c2, cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  id(wcel(c0, crngo))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cop(c1, c2), crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cablo), wf(c2, cxp(c3, c3), c3)), wa(wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, c3, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), c1, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, c2nd, c0)
  isrngo(s0, s1, s2, c2, universe, c1, c3)
}

thm rngoi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà RingOps ‚Üí((c1 ‚àà AbelOp ‚àß(c2 :(c3 √ó c3)‚Üí c3))‚àß(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c3,(((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))‚àß(s0[c2](s1[c1]s2))=((s0[c2]s1)[c1](s0[c2]s2))‚àß((s0[c1]s1)[c2]s2)=((s0[c2]s2)[c1](s1[c2]s2))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(1st ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(2nd ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 = ran(c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà RingOps ‚Üí((c1 ‚àà AbelOp ‚àß(c2 :(c3 √ó c3)‚Üí c3))‚àß(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c3,(((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))‚àß(s0[c2](s1[c1]s2))=((s0[c2]s1)[c1](s0[c2]s2))‚àß((s0[c1]s1)[c2]s2)=((s0[c2]s2)[c1](s1[c2]s2))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))))), d(s0, c0))
  sylib(c0 ‚àà RingOps, ((c1 ‚àà AbelOp ‚àß(c2 :(c3 √ó c3)‚Üí c3))‚àß(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c3,(((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))‚àß(s0[c2](s1[c1]s2))=((s0[c2]s1)[c1](s0[c2]s2))‚àß((s0[c1]s1)[c2]s2)=((s0[c2]s2)[c1](s1[c2]s2))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))), < c1, c2 > ‚àà RingOps)
  eqeltrd(< c1, c2 >, crngo, c0, c0 ‚àà RingOps)
  syl6reqr(< c1, c2 >, c0, <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, c0 ‚àà RingOps)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà RingOps, c0 = <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, Rel(RingOps))
  relrngo()
  1st2nd(crngo, c0)
  opeq12i(c1, c2, (1st ` c0), (2nd ` c0))
  id(c0 ‚àà RingOps)
  ax-mp((< c1, c2 > ‚àà RingOps ‚Üî((c1 ‚àà AbelOp ‚àß(c2 :(c3 √ó c3)‚Üí c3))‚àß(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c3,(((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))‚àß(s0[c2](s1[c1]s2))=((s0[c2]s1)[c1](s0[c2]s2))‚àß((s0[c1]s1)[c2]s2)=((s0[c2]s2)[c1](s1[c2]s2))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))))), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c2, c2nd, c0)

blocks.name: rngosm
blocks.content: Functionality of the multiplication operation of a ring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm rngosm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c3))
} = {
  simprd(wcel(c0, crngo), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2), wcel(c3, cablo))
  simpld(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wcel(c3, cablo), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2)), wa(wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wral(hs2, c2, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c1, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), c1, co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), c1, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), c3, co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))))))), wrex(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))))
  rngoi(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c3, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: rngodi
blocks.content: Distributive law for the multiplication operation of a ring (left-distributivity). (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngo2
blocks.content: A ring element plus itself is two times the element. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.content: In a unital ring the addition is an abelian group. (Contributed by FL, 31-Aug-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngogrpo

blocks.name: rngone0

blocks.name: rngogcl
blocks.content: Closure law for the addition (group) operation of a ring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngocom
blocks.content: The addition operation of a ring is commutative. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngoaass

blocks.name: rngoa32

blocks.name: rngoa4

blocks.name: rngorcan

blocks.name: rngo0lid

blocks.name: rngolz

blocks.name: rngosn4
blocks.content: Obsolete as of 25-Jan-2020. Use ~ rngen1zr instead. The only unital ring with one element is the zero ring. (Contributed by FL, 14-Feb-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngosn6
blocks.content: Obsolete as of 25-Jan-2020. Use ~ ringen1zr or ~ srgen1zr instead. The only unital ring with one element is the zero ring. (Contributed by FL, 15-Feb-2010.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngonegcl
blocks.content: A ring is closed under negation. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)

blocks.name: rngoaddneg1
blocks.content: Adding the negative in a ring gives zero. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)

blocks.name: rngoaddneg2
blocks.content: Adding the negative in a ring gives zero. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)

blocks.name: rngosub
blocks.content: Subtraction in a ring, in terms of addition and negation. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)

blocks.name: rngmgmbs4
blocks.content: The range of an internal operation with a left and right identity element equals its base set. (Contributed by FL, 24-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngoidmlem
blocks.content: The unit of a ring is an identity element for the multiplication. (Contributed by FL, 18-Feb-2010.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm rngoidmlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1)))

} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1)))

  cmpidelt(c4, c1, crn(c4), c3)
  eqid(crn(c4))
  mpcom(wcel(c0, crngo), wb(wi(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1))), wi(wcel(c1, crn(c4)), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1)))), wceq(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(c4)))

  mpan(wceq(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(c4)), wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wb(wi(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1))), wi(wcel(c1, crn(c4)), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1))))), wceq(c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))))
  syl(wa(wceq(c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))), wceq(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(c4))), wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wb(wi(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1))), wi(wcel(c1, crn(c4)), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1))))), wceq(c2, crn(c4)))
  eqtr(c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(c4))
  ex(wceq(c2, crn(c4)), wcel(c0, crngo), wb(wi(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1))), wi(wcel(c1, crn(c4)), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1)))))
  imbi1d(wa(wceq(c2, crn(c4)), wcel(c0, crngo)), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1)), wcel(c1, crn(c4)))

thm rngoidmlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà RingOps ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(2nd ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ran((1st ` c0))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(GId ` c4)
} = {
  imp(c0 ‚àà RingOps, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1))
  mpbird(c0 ‚àà RingOps, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1)), (c1 ‚àà ran(c4)‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1)))
  3syl(c0 ‚àà RingOps, (c1 ‚àà ran(c4)‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1)), c4 ‚àà MndOp, c4 ‚àà(Magma ‚ãÇ ExId))
  rngomndo(c0, c4)
  mndomgmid(c4)
  ex(c4 ‚àà(Magma ‚ãÇ ExId), c1 ‚àà ran(c4), ((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1))
  cmpidelt(c4, c1, ran(c4), c3)
  eqid(ran(c4))
  mpcom(c0 ‚àà RingOps, ((c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1))‚Üî(c1 ‚àà ran(c4)‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1))), ran((1st ` c0))= ran(c4))
  rngorn1eq(c0, (1st ` c0), c4)
  eqid((1st ` c0))
  mpan(ran((1st ` c0))= ran(c4), (c0 ‚àà RingOps ‚Üí((c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1))‚Üî(c1 ‚àà ran(c4)‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1)))), c2 = ran((1st ` c0)))
  syl((c2 = ran((1st ` c0))‚àß ran((1st ` c0))= ran(c4)), (c0 ‚àà RingOps ‚Üí((c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1))‚Üî(c1 ‚àà ran(c4)‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1)))), c2 = ran(c4))
  eqtr(c2, ran((1st ` c0)), ran(c4))
  ex(c2 = ran(c4), c0 ‚àà RingOps, ((c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1))‚Üî(c1 ‚àà ran(c4)‚Üí((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1))))
  imbi1d((c2 = ran(c4)‚àß c0 ‚àà RingOps), c1 ‚àà c2, ((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1), c1 ‚àà ran(c4))
  eleq2d(c1, c2, ran(c4), (c2 = ran(c4)‚àß c0 ‚àà RingOps))
  simpl(c2 = ran(c4), c0 ‚àà RingOps)
}

thm rngo1cl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cgi, c3))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, crn(cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, crn(cfv(c2nd, c0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cin(cmagm, cexid)))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cin(cmagm, cexid)), wa(wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmagm), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cexid)))
  syl(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmagm), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cexid)), wcel(c3, cmndo))
  rngomndo(c0, c3)
  sylbi(wcel(c3, cmndo), wa(wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmagm), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cexid)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmndo))
  eleq1i(c3, cmndo, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  jca(wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmndo), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmagm), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cexid))
  mndoismgmOLD(cfv(c2nd, c0))
  mndoisexid(cfv(c2nd, c0))
  elin(cfv(c2nd, c0), cmagm, cexid)
  iorlid(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1, crn(cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  eqid(crn(cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  eqtri(c1, cfv(cgi, cfv(c2nd, c0)), cfv(cgi, c3))
  fveq2i(cgi, c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, crngo), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, crn(cfv(c2nd, c0)))), wceq(c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))), wceq(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  rngorn1eq(c0, cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c2nd, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  eleq2d(c1, c2, crn(cfv(c2nd, c0)), wa(wceq(c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))), wceq(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(cfv(c2nd, c0)))))
  eqtr(c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(cfv(c2nd, c0)))
}

thm rngo1cl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà RingOps ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ran((1st ` c0))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(2nd ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(GId ` c3)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ‚àà RingOps, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà ran((2nd ` c0)))
  syl(c0 ‚àà RingOps, c1 ‚àà ran((2nd ` c0)), (2nd ` c0)‚àà(Magma ‚ãÇ ExId))
  sylibr(c0 ‚àà RingOps, (2nd ` c0)‚àà(Magma ‚ãÇ ExId), ((2nd ` c0)‚àà Magma ‚àß(2nd ` c0)‚àà ExId))
  syl(c0 ‚àà RingOps, ((2nd ` c0)‚àà Magma ‚àß(2nd ` c0)‚àà ExId), c3 ‚àà MndOp)
  rngomndo(c0, c3)
  sylbi(c3 ‚àà MndOp, ((2nd ` c0)‚àà Magma ‚àß(2nd ` c0)‚àà ExId), (2nd ` c0)‚àà MndOp)
  eleq1i(c3, cmndo, (2nd ` c0))
  jca((2nd ` c0)‚àà MndOp, (2nd ` c0)‚àà Magma, (2nd ` c0)‚àà ExId)
  mndoismgmOLD((2nd ` c0))
  mndoisexid((2nd ` c0))
  elin((2nd ` c0), cmagm, cexid)
  iorlid((2nd ` c0), c1, ran((2nd ` c0)))
  eqid(ran((2nd ` c0)))
  eqtri(c1, (GId `(2nd ` c0)), (GId ` c3))
  fveq2i(cgi, c3, (2nd ` c0))
  sylancr(c0 ‚àà RingOps, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî c1 ‚àà ran((2nd ` c0))), c2 = ran((1st ` c0)), ran((1st ` c0))= ran((2nd ` c0)))
  rngorn1eq(c0, (1st ` c0), (2nd ` c0))

  eleq2d(c1, c2, ran((2nd ` c0)), (c2 = ran((1st ` c0))‚àß ran((1st ` c0))= ran((2nd ` c0))))
  eqtr(c2, ran((1st ` c0)), ran((2nd ` c0)))
}

  ralrimiva(hs0, c1, wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), cv(hs0)))
  rngoridm(c0, cv(hs0), c1, c5, c2)

  com24(wral(hs0, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, crngo), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3)), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3))), wi(wne(c1, emptycls), wbr(c1, cen, c1o)))

  ex(wral(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3)))), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3)), wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wi(wne(c1, emptycls), wbr(c1, cen, c1o))))
  sylbir(wa(wral(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3)))), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3))), wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wi(wne(c1, emptycls), wbr(c1, cen, c1o))), wral(hs0, c1, wa(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3))))
  r19.26(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3))
  syl(wral(hs0, c1, wa(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3))), wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wi(wne(c1, emptycls), wbr(c1, cen, c1o))), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  ralimi(hs0, c1, wa(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  imp31(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  eqcoms(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), cv(hs0), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3)), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))
  ex(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), c5, c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3)), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  syl(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), c5, c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3))), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3)))
  eqtr(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), c5, c2), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3))
  ex(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  eqtr(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), c5, c3), c3)
  com3l(wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, emptycls), wbr(c1, cen, c1o))

thm rngoueqz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà RingOps ‚Üí(c1[‚âÖ]1o ‚Üî c2 = c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(1st ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(2nd ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(GId ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(GId ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 = ran(c4)
} = {
  impbid(c0 ‚àà RingOps, c1[‚âÖ]1o, c2 = c3)
  mpcom(c0 ‚àà RingOps, (c1[‚âÖ]1o ‚Üí c2 = c3), c3 ‚àà c1)
  com23(c3 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà RingOps, c1[‚âÖ]1o, c2 = c3)

  syl5com((c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c1[‚âÖ]1o), c0 ‚àà RingOps, c2 = c3, c1 = { c3 })
  en1eqsn(c3, c1)

  rngo1cl(c0, c2, ran(c4), c5)

  syl6com(c2 ‚àà c1, c1 = { c3 }, c2 = c3, c2 ‚àà { c3 })
  biimpd(c1 = { c3 }, c2 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà { c3 })
  eleq2(c1, { c3 }, c2)
  elsni(c2, c3)
  eqcomi(ran(c4), c1)
  mpcom(c0 ‚àà RingOps, (c2 = c3 ‚Üí c1[‚âÖ]1o), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  rngone0(c0, c1, c4)
  com13(c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà RingOps, c2 = c3, c1[‚âÖ]1o)
  syl5com(c2 = c3, c0 ‚àà RingOps, (c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí c1[‚âÖ]1o), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(hs0[c5]c2)=(hs0[c5]c3)))
  ralrimivw(hs0, c1, c2 = c3, (hs0[c5]c2)=(hs0[c5]c3))
  oveq2(c2, c3, hs0, c5)
  mpd(c0 ‚àà RingOps, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(hs0[c5]c2)=(hs0[c5]c3))‚Üí(c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí c1[‚âÖ]1o)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(hs0[c5]c3)= c3))
